sentences.en: Bank base rates have fallen from 10 per cent to 6 per cent — a decrease of 40 per cent.
sentences.cn: 银行的基本利率已从10%降到了6%，降幅高达40%。

sentences.en: Gradually decrease the amount of vitamin C you are taking.
sentences.cn: 逐渐减少维生素C的服用量。

sentences.en: In finish cutting we increase the speed and decrease the feed.
sentences.cn: 精切时,我们增加速度,减少进给量.

sentences.en: In Spain and Portugal there has been a decrease in the number of young people out of work.
sentences.cn: 在西班牙和葡萄牙，失业青年人数已经有所下降。

sentences.en: It is necessary to decrease the amount of coal used.
Last year there was a 20 % decrease in his earnings.
The birthrate is on the decrease.
The decrease in sales was almost 20 percent.
The demand for tea is on the decrease ( each year ).
sentences.cn: 茶叶的需求量 ( 逐年 ) 递减.

sentences.en: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.en: The prices of polymers and suchlike materials will decrease.
sentences.cn: 聚合物及类似材料的价格会下降。

sentences.en: There has been a decrease in traffic accidents.
There has been a progressive decrease in population every year in this city.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的人口在逐年递减.

sentences.en: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
There has been some decrease in imports.
These measures will help decrease the cost of production.
sentences.cn: 这些措施有助于降低生产成本.

sentences.en: They are making every effort to decrease the production cost.
sentences.cn: 他们正尽力减少生产成本.

sentences.en: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.cn: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

trans.tran_en: the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less
to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
